data.name: padding.Help
data.value: Space between FancyBox wrapper and content (default 10)

data.name: margin.Help
data.value: Space between viewport and FancyBox wrapper (default 20)

data.name: opacity.Help
data.value: When true, transparency of content is changed for elastic transitions (default false)

data.name: modal.Help
data.value: When true, 'overlayShow' is set to 'true' and 'hideOnOverlayClick', 'hideOnContentClick', 'enableEscapeButton', 'showCloseButton' are set to 'false' (default false)

data.name: cyclic.Help
data.value: When true, galleries will be cyclic, allowing you to keep pressing next/back. (default false)

data.name: scrolling.Help
data.value: Set the overflow CSS property to create or hide scrollbars. Can be set to 'auto', 'yes', or 'no' (default 'auto')

data.name: width.Help
data.value: Width for content types 'iframe' and 'swf'. Also set for inline content if 'autoDimensions' is set to 'false' (default 560)

data.name: height.Help
data.value: Height for content types 'iframe' and 'swf'. Also set for inline content if 'autoDimensions' is set to 'false' (default 340)

data.name: autoScale.Help
data.value: If true, FancyBox is scaled to fit in viewport (default true)

data.name: autoDimensions.Help
data.value: For inline and ajax views, resizes the view to the element recieves. Make sure it has dimensions otherwise this will give unexpected results (default true)

data.name: centerOnScroll.Help
data.value: When true, FancyBox is centered while scrolling page Note: 'error' and 'success' will be overwritten by FancyBox (default false)

data.name: swf.Help
data.value: Params to put on the swf object (default {wmode: 'transparent'})

data.name: hideOnOverlayClick.Help
data.value: Toggle if clicking the overlay should close FancyBox (default true)

data.name: hideOnContentClick.Help
data.value: Toggle if clicking the content should close FancyBox (default false)

data.name: overlayOpacity.Help
data.value: Opacity of the overlay (from 0 to 1; default - 0.3) (default 0.3)

data.name: titlePosition.Help
data.value: The position of title. Can be set to 'outside', 'inside' or 'over' (default 'outside')

data.name: titleFormat.Help
data.value: Callback to customize title area. You can set any html - custom image counter or even custom navigation (default null)

data.name: transitionIn.Help
data.value: The transition type. Can be set to 'elastic', 'fade' or 'none' (default 'fade')

data.name: transitionOut.Help
data.value: The transition type. Can be set to 'elastic', 'fade' or 'none' (default 'fade')

data.name: speedIn.Help
data.value: Speed of the fade and elastic transitions, in milliseconds (default 300)

data.name: speedOut.Help
data.value: Speed of the fade and elastic transitions, in milliseconds (default 300)

data.name: changeSpeed.Help
data.value: Speed of resizing when changing gallery items, in milliseconds (default 300)

data.name: changeFade.Help
data.value: Speed of the content fading while changing gallery items (default 'fast')

data.name: enableEscapeButton.Help
data.value: Toggle if pressing Esc button closes FancyBox (default true)
